traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The salvager can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The salvager makes two attacks with its coral rapier.

actions.name: Coral Rapier
entries: {@atk m} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Inject Toxin (2/Day)
entries: {@atk m} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage, and the creature must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.
